sub_title: Data Analyst, improving organizational operations & outreach through analysis & visualization
summary: Data Analyst with over seven years of experience working with highly sensitive data, helping organizations improve operations and outreach to clients through analysis and visualization. Regularly work on multiple projects, and under tight deadlines, managing teams to reach project objectives.

company.name: UCLA Center for Health Services and Society

profile_positions.company: UCLA Center for Health Services and Society
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst

profile_positions.company: UCLA Center for Health Services and Society
profile_positions.description:
Created maps, graphs, and other figures for publications, grant proposals, and other reports using data query, analysis, and visualization tools such as SQL, Tableau, R, Excel, Atlas. Communicated research procedures to statisticians and communicated statistical findings to project staff to facilitate analysis. Created pamphlets and videos for patient outreach, from conceptualization to content creation, including filming and editing. Wrote reports to communicate research findings, project progress, strategies, and technical data to high impact journals, project funders, regulatory boards, and other project stakeholders. Managed teams to monitor progress, troubleshoot issues, and develop strategies for most effectively meeting project goals.


    •  Built interactive dashboards in Tableau and spreadsheets in Excel, using complex formulas, macros, conditional formatting, and data validation to efficiently process data and facilitate analysis in a rapidly changing project environment

    •  Designed web-based applications, incorporating custom features using SQL, with customized multi-user interfaces to understand client needs for a project with a budget of $5 million

    •  Investigated project expenditures and created a financial model, assigning costs to a study with a budget of $25 million and over 1000 participants

    •  Established the Mental Health group in the UCLA Center of Excellence, enabling access to data analysis tools used to explore data and create insights

    •  Improved data collection procedures, increasing project efficiency and saving over 300 staff hours 

    •  Analyzed data, wrote research articles, and created posters for publication in high impact journals and conferences
profile_positions.title: Senior Research Associate III

profile_positions.description:
Analyzed emerging technologies in the electric vehicle industry to inform corporate partners about future directions and investment


    •  Developed complex reports to convey the landscape of the emerging electric vehicle industry and inform business decisions for multinational automobile manufacturers
profile_positions.title: Research Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Researched information to be used in publication materials, speeches, and endorsement decisions, and managed multiple confidential databases containing information about high dollar donors and political endorsers.

  •  Raised over $5,000 in political contributions through phone calls to potential supporters
profile_positions.title: Financial Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Facilitated the creation of commercial film projects, on topics ranging from documentaries, classroom content, and live music. Assisted with filming, editing, and producing. 

  •  Filmed over 20 hours of live band performances for a music festival
  •  Produced over 10 film projects
profile_positions.title: Film Editor and Camera Operator

profile_positions.description:
Monitored user submitted website content for copyright or other content concerns,, highlighting noteworthy videos to feature on the site. Provided user support for any technical, copyright, or censorship concerns related to website content.

  •  Improved website navigability through categorization of over 200 videos daily
  •  Communicated with over 50 clients each day to address site concerns
profile_positions.title: Content Manager and Videographer

profile_positions.description:
•  Researched material for potential storylines for a one million dollar documentary

•  Coordinated supplies and information for a ten person film crew 

•  Arranged schedule and travel itinerary for film shoots across the country
profile_positions.title: Post Production Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•  Researched policy issues for the City of Los Angeles and provided recommendations to the Councilman 

•  Responded to constituents' inquiries with respect to policies on transportation, the environment and other community issues 

•  Met with constituents on behalf of the Councilman monthly
profile_positions.title: Special Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•  Researched and organized data for an informational publication distributed to thousands of individuals

•  Led a group that lobbied Congressman Henry Waxman to enact legislation prohibiting nuclear proliferation 

•  Organized and coordinated groups of as many as fifteen volunteers at monthly public relation events
profile_positions.title: Assistant Coordinator
